name: Hole alone (Nocshiftgames)
description:
Set in a future where Earth left a hole after being destroyed by unknown beings. Philip with his A.I dog named D must embark on a journey to find those responsible. 

It's a laid back point and click adventure with small reference to modern pop culture and anime because I like them. Thanks!

Game play time: ~10 minutes 

Ending: 1 (more to come when done)

-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-

This is an ongoing  project from Brackeys game jam 2020... which I accidentally deleted trying to update not knowing you can't re-upload while there's voting. 

Anyway, the plot is done and the arts are drawn but still need time. I have 5+ more scenes until the ending. Then, I can split endings to three or more depending on your choices in the game. I hope I get more time to work on this. It's infinitely more fun than my job. Thank you for playing. Have a wonderful day.

Credits: Art by me,  Texture from unsplash, Sfx from freesound.com, Unity game engine and adventure creator, music: Worlds Acoustic I by Vireos and Parallel by Ross Bugden
